trans-unit.source: Provides a wrapper for converting server components into client script.
This class uses an internal dictionary to hold references to components, elements, properties, and events.

To populate this dictionary, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddComponentProperty%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddElementProperty%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddProperty%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddEvent%2A> methods.
When you are finished, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method to generate the client script.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor"></xref> class.
The type of the target client component.
type is `null` or an empty string ("").
Adds the specified property, and associates that property with the specified element.

This method adds the specified property to the internal dictionary of properties that are used by the control and converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
The name of the property.
The ID of the target component.
name or componentID is `null` or an empty string ("").
Adds the specified property and associates that property with the specified component.
This method adds the specified property to the internal dictionary of properties that are converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
The name of the property.
The ID of the target element.
name or component is `null` or an empty string ("").
Adds the specified event and handler.
This method adds the event and handler to the internal dictionary of events that are converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
The name of the event.
The name of the handler function for the specified event.
name or handler is `null` or an empty string ("").
Adds the specified property and value.
This method adds the property and value to the internal dictionary of properties that are converted to client script by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.GetScript%2A> method.
The name of the property.
The value of the property.
name is `null` or an empty string ("").
Adds the specified property, and associates the property with the specified script.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor.AddScriptProperty%2A> method to render script that is not serialized to the browser.
The name of the property.
The script that is rendered to the browser.
script is `null` or an empty string ("").
When overridden in a derived class, gets the identifier of the client component.
The ID of the client component.
Gets the client script that implements the target control on the page.
The client script that implements the target control on the page.
Gets or sets the ID of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor"></xref> instance.
The ID of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptComponentDescriptor"></xref> instance, if set; otherwise, an empty string ("").
Gets or sets the type of the target client component.
The type of the target client component.
An attempt was made to set the property to `null`.
